bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with fu gu ju 附骨疽 , bone-attached impediment - illness. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry lu feng fang 露蜂房：主諸惡疽，附骨癰，根在臟腑 , “It controls all types of malign impediment - illnesses and bone-attached obstruction-illnesses , whose roots are in the depots and palaces”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主 治藥 quotes this as 惡疽、附骨疽，根在臟腑 , “Malign impediment - illnesses and bone-attached impediment - illnesses, whose roots are in the depots and palaces”. Elsewhere in the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 , Substance Entry lu feng fang 露蜂房 , the Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 is quoted as follows: 治惡疽、附骨癰，根在臟腑 , “It cures malign impediment-illnesses, and bone-attached obstruction-illnesses whose roots are in the depots and palaces”.
